formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Taxable income (estimate mode): $$ TI = \\max\\big(0,\\; AGI_{VA} + Additions - Subtractions - SD - Exemptions \\big) $$ Where: $$ Exemptions = PE \\times N_{people} $$ Virginia tax (piecewise): $$ Tax(TI) = \\begin{cases} 0.02\\,TI & 0 \\le TI \\le 3{,}000 \\\\ 60 + 0.03\\,(TI - 3{,}000) & 3{,}000 < TI \\le 5{,}000 \\\\ 120 + 0.05\\,(TI - 5{,}000) & 5{,}000 < TI \\le 17{,}000 \\\\ 720 + 0.0575\\,(TI - 17{,}000) & TI > 17{,}000 \\end{cases} $$ Rates: $$ Marginal\\ Rate = \\frac{d\\,Tax}{d\\,TI} \\quad ; \\quad Average\\ Rate = \\frac{Tax}{TI} $$

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
